FuncDef: The display dot1x-access-profile configuration command displays the configuration of an 802.1X access profile. The display dot1x-access-profile configuration command displays the configuration of an 802.1X access profile. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the configuration of an 802.1X access profile with a specified name.
If name is not specified, the device displays all the 802.1X access profiles configured on the device. If name is specified, the device displays the configuration of a specified 802.1X access profile.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.
